extendedIngredients.name: egg
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 egg (or one more 6oz container of Chobani)

extendedIngredients.name: greek yogurt
extendedIngredients.originalString: 6 oz container of Passion Fruit Chobani Greek Yogurt

extendedIngredients.name: half and half
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ cup half and half (or any milk)

recipes.title: Big Stack Of Passion + 10 Random Things About Me
recipes.instructions: In medium bowl – mix together milk, yogurt, water, and egg.In small bowl – mix together both flours, baking powder, and salt. Then mix with wet ingredients in medium bowl.Use a nonstick pan and heat to medium-low, lightly oil pan or use small amount of butter.Use a ½ cup, and place about ½ cup of batter on pan. If you have big enough pan, you can make more than one at a time. Let it cook until the dough side looks rough in appearance, and bubbles have pretty much stopped forming. Should take about 1 to 1½ minutes for each side.Enjoy!

steps.step: In medium bowl – mix together milk, yogurt, water, and egg.In small bowl – mix together both flours, baking powder, and salt. Then mix with wet ingredients in medium bowl.Use a nonstick pan and heat to medium-low, lightly oil pan or use small amount of butter.Use a ½ cup, and place about ½ cup of batter on pan. If you have big enough pan, you can make more than one at a time.
Let it cook until the dough side looks rough in appearance, and bubbles have pretty much stopped forming. Should take about 1 to 1½ minutes for each side.Enjoy!
